name: RI_1_1_25_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Verification_Event
title: RI.1.1.25.1 Evidence of Record Entry Verification Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Verification Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Verification Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of Record Entry verification.

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content verification occurred.

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of verified Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user verifying Record Entry content

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application in which Record Entry content verification occurred.

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., verification event).

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of Record Entry content verification.

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content verification occurred.

statement.label: RI.1.1.25.1#09
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the data, document or other identifier for verified  Record Entry content.
